intent_atoms.description: Migrate ISOInspectorApp details panel container sections to use FoundationUI Design System DS.Card and DS.SectionHeader components for consistent layout and dark mode support.
All details panel container sections must use DS.Card component with appropriate elevation levels (thin, regular, thick).
All section headers must be replaced with DS.SectionHeader component via BoxSectionHeader wrapper.
No hardcoded padding, corner radius, or shadow values; all spacing uses DS.Spacing tokens.
Dark mode rendering must be correct and consistent across all cards using ColorSchemeAdapter.
Card elevation hierarchy must be visually clear (thin < regular < thick).
Unit test coverage for new wrapper components must be ≥90%.
Snapshot tests must pass for all card variants in light and dark modes.
Integration tests must verify card nesting behavior.
Accessibility tests must confirm semantic structure, landmarks, VoiceOver announcements, keyboard focus order, and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with score ≥98%.
No performance regressions in details panel rendering; frame time <16ms.
FoundationUI DS.Card and DS.SectionHeader components are available and integrated into the project.
Create BoxDetailsCard wrapper around DS.Card to support all elevation levels and platform adaptation context.

functional_units.name: BoxDetailsCard
functional_units.description: SwiftUI wrapper around FoundationUI DS.Card providing elevation levels (thin, regular, thick) and platform adaptation for details panel sections.

functional_units.name: BoxSectionHeader
functional_units.description: SwiftUI wrapper around FoundationUI DS.SectionHeader with typography variants, optional divider support, and VoiceOver landmark announcements for section headers.

functional_units.name: DetailsPanelCardLayout
functional_units.description: Refactored layout of the ISOInspectorApp details panel using BoxDetailsCard and BoxSectionHeader, replacing manual styling with Design System tokens and automatic dark mode rendering.

functional_units.name: CardElevationUnitTests
functional_units.description: Unit tests covering all DS.Card elevation variants (thin, regular, thick) within BoxDetailsCard, ensuring correct appearance and token usage.

functional_units.name: CardSnapshotTests
functional_units.description: Snapshot tests for light/dark modes and elevation levels of BoxDetailsCard to verify visual consistency across platforms.

functional_units.name: CardIntegrationTests
functional_units.description: Integration tests validating nested card layouts, cards inside scrollable containers, and interaction with other FoundationUI components.

functional_units.name: AccessibilityTests
functional_units.description: Tests confirming semantic structure, landmarks, VoiceOver announcements, keyboard focus order, and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for BoxDetailsCard and BoxSectionHeader.

functional_units.name: DarkModeVerification
functional_units.description: Manual and automated checks ensuring automatic dark mode adaptation via ColorSchemeAdapter for all card components across macOS, iOS, and iPadOS.
